other_tests.findings: Weight loss of 46 kg after first gastroplasty at age 16; weight loss of 40 kg and maintenance after second gastroplasty at age 18.
other_tests.changes_over_time: First gastroplasty led to significant weight loss but required removal due to complications, followed by rapid weight regain; second gastroplasty led to both weight loss and maintenance over 8 years.

other_tests.findings: Bone age evaluated by hand and wrist radiography was 17 years.
Normal human chorionic gonadotropin hormone stimulation tests.
REE was 16% lower than predicted at 16 years and 26% lower at 18 years; normalized at 19 years of age.
other_tests.changes_over_time: REE normalized close to the predicted value at 19 years.

other_tests.findings: Elevated serum LEP concentrations (162 ng/mL) suggesting possible LEPR deficiency.
Testicular hypotrophy diagnosed based on clinical and ultrasonographic measurements.
